features.title: Key Features
features.description: NextPlate includes everything you need to build modern web applications quickly.

items.title: Secure Authentication
items.description: Complete integration with Supabase and Mailgun for a robust and professional authentication experience.

items.title: Modern Interface
items.description: Elegant and accessible UI components with Shadcn, ready to customize according to your needs.

items.title: Integrated Payments
items.description: Payment and subscription processing with Stripe, including pre-configured webhooks.

items.title: Artificial Intelligence

items.title: Multilingual
items.description: Support for multiple languages with next-intl, facilitating the global expansion of your application.

items.title: Legal Compliance
items.description: Customizable legal documents and cookie banner to comply with regulations like GDPR.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: At NextPlate, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our boilerplate.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: Depending on how you use NextPlate, we may collect different types of information:

subsections.title: 1.1 Information you provide voluntarily
subsections.content: Information you provide when registering, contacting us, or interacting with our services, such as name, email address, and contact details.

subsections.title: 1.2 Information collected automatically
subsections.content: Technical information such as IP address, browser type, Internet service provider, referring/exit pages, operating system, date/time stamp, and clickstream data.

subsections.title: 1.3 Cookies and similar technologies
subsections.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance user experience, analyze trends, and administer the site. See our Cookie Policy for more information.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
content: We use the collected information to provide, maintain, and improve our services.
We may also use your information to communicate with you, sending technical updates, security alerts, and support messages.

sections.title: 3. Sharing Information
sections.content: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except when necessary to provide services or comply with legal requirements.

sections.title: 4. Data Security
sections.content: We implement security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights related to your personal data, such as the right to access, correct, delete, or limit the processing of your data.
To exercise these rights, contact us through the channels provided at the end of this policy.

sections.title: 6. Changes to This Policy

sections.title: 7. Contact

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.introduction: This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can control them when using NextPlate. By using our boilerplate, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.

sections.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to the site owners.
Cookies can be 'persistent' or 'session' cookies. Persistent cookies remain on your device after you close your browser, while session cookies are deleted when you close your browser.

sections.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
sections.content: We use different types of cookies for the following reasons:

subsections.title: 2.1 Essential cookies
subsections.content: Necessary for the basic functioning of the site. These cookies do not collect personal information.

subsections.title: 2.2 Performance cookies
subsections.content: Collect information about how you use our site, such as which pages you visit most frequently. This data helps us optimize the site.

subsections.title: 2.3 Functionality cookies
subsections.content: Allow the site to remember your choices (such as your username or language) and provide enhanced, more personal features.

subsections.title: 2.4 Advertising and analytics cookies
subsections.content: Collect information about your browsing habits to offer you relevant advertising and analyze our site's performance.

sections.title: 3. Cookie Control
content: You can control and manage cookies in various ways. Most browsers allow you to delete cookies, block the acceptance of cookies, or receive a warning before a cookie is stored.
Please note that removing or blocking cookies can affect your user experience, and parts of our site may not function properly.

sections.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
sections.content: Some of our services use third-party cookies, such as analytics services and social networks. We have no control over these cookies.

sections.title: 5. Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update our Cookie Policy periodically. We recommend that you review this page regularly to stay informed of any changes.

sections.title: 6. Contact
sections.content: If you have questions about our Cookie Policy, please contact us through our website or GitHub repository.
